Class BaseTest

java.lang.Object
academy.teenfuture.crse.qa.hkbus.playwright.BaseTest
public class BaseTest extends Object
BaseTest is a superclass designed for managing test setup and execution for Playwright-based browser automation tests. It provides a foundation for creating and running automated tests in a consistent environment. This class includes the following key functionalities:
  • Browser Management: Initializes and manages browser contexts and pages for each test, ensuring isolated test environments.
  • Video Recording: Configures video recording for each test session, enabling users to review test executions for debugging purposes.
  • Extent Reports Integration: Facilitates the integration with Extent Reports for generating detailed test reports. This includes logging test results, attaching screenshots, and providing a visual representation of test outcomes.
  • Resource Cleanup: Ensures proper cleanup of resources such as browser pages and contexts after each test, preventing memory leaks and ensuring resource availability for subsequent tests.

Supported Browsers

  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • Edge
  • WebKit

Usage: Extend this class to create specific test classes. Call the configure() method in the test's setup phase to initialize the browser and report. Use the generateExtentTest() method to log test results and attach screenshots as needed.

Example: 

 public class MyTest extends BaseTest {
        @BeforeEach
        public void setup() {
                super.configure("firefox");
        }
 
        @Test
        public void testExample() {
                // Test implementation
        }

  • Method Details

    • configure

      public com.microsoft.playwright.Page configure(String browserName)
      Initializes Playwright and configures the browser.
      Parameters:
      browserName - the name of the browser to launch (e.g., "chrome", "firefox").
      Returns:
      the Page object for the launched browser.

    • configure

      public com.microsoft.playwright.Page configure(String browserName, boolean isVideo)
      Configures the browser for testing, optionally enabling video recording.
      Parameters:
      browserName - the name of the browser to launch (e.g., "chrome", "firefox").
      isVideo - whether to enable video recording for the test session.
      Returns:
      the Page object for the launched browser.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an unsupported browser is specified.

    • generateExtentTest

      public void generateExtentTest(String testName, boolean isSuccess, String message)
      Generates a test entry in the Extent Report.
      Parameters:
      testName - the name of the test case to log.
      isSuccess - whether the test case passed or failed.
      message - a message describing the test case result.

    • generateExtentTest

      public void generateExtentTest(String testName, boolean isSuccess, String message, byte[] screenshot) throws IOException
      Generates a test entry in the Extent Report.
      Parameters:
      testName - the name of the test case to log.
      isSuccess - whether the test case passed or failed.
      message - a message describing the test case result.
      screenshot - a byte array representing the screenshot to attach to the report.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while processing the screenshot.

    • flushExtentReports

      public void flushExtentReports()
      Flushes the ExtentReports instance, writing all report data to the output file.

    • endTest

      public void endTest()
      Ends the test execution by flushing reports and cleaning up resources.
